title: Punipuni to Sarasara: Aruiwa Mokeibeya no Shounen to Shoujo ni Okeru Hyoumen Chouryoku to Mousaikan Genshou
original_name: プニプニとサラサラ あるいは模型部屋の少年と少女における表面張力と毛細管現象
sinopse:
The romantic comedy manga centers on a popular model who loves plastic models of warships, and her childhood friend who is in high school.

(Source: ANN)
